name: Grilled Pineapple Salsa
keywords: pineapple, scallion, tomato, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon mild chili powder, like Aleppo or New Mexico
1 medium pineapple, peeled, cored and sliced or quartered
1 tablespoon lemon juice, or to taste
1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro or mint leaves, or a combination
1 tablespoon lime juice, or to taste
1 medium tomato, cored, seeded and chopped, with its juice
Freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 teaspoons sherry or balsamic vinegar, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Start a charcoal or gas grill; fire should be moderately hot. Combine chili powder, salt and sugar and sprinkle pineapple with it. Grill on each side until lightly browned, 5 to 10 minutes total. Remove and cool.
Roughly chop pineapple and combine it and its juice with any of the 3 groups of ingredients. Taste and adjust seasoning and serve immediately.
